definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident

sentences.english: The police rank of any traffic policeman who is imposed upon an administrative sanction below removal from post shall be degraded.
sentences.chinese: 受到撤職以下行政處分的交通警察，應當降低警銜。

sentences.english: He tore up a traffic citation for jaywalking in front of the police officer who'd ticketed him.
sentences.chinese: 他當着交通警察的面，把闖越馬路的罰單撕掉了。

sentences.english: Jane's husband Li Ke is a traffic policeman.
sentences.chinese: 簡的丈夫李克是交通警察。

sentences.english: Dumb sister was sent to hospital, the traffic police to find the perpetrators.
sentences.chinese: 啞妹被送進醫院搶救，交通警察全力尋找肇事人。

sentences.english: The traffic policeman is maintaining the order of the transportation.
sentences.chinese: 交通警察在維持道路的交通秩序。

sentences.english: It is like a traffic cop.
His car was clamped by the traffic police.
sentences.chinese: 他的轎車被交通警察用輪夾給鎖住了。

sentences.english: Any traffic policeman who is assessed to be unqualified shall not be on post to perform his duties.
sentences.chinese: 交通警察經考覈不合格的，不得上崗執行職務。

sentences.english: Traffic police administrative compulsion is one part of the national administrative compulsions .
sentences.chinese: 交通警察行政強制是我國行政強制中的組成部分之一。

sentences.english: The policemen stand on the roads and keep people from crossing the roads when the light is red.
sentences.chinese: 交通警察站在馬路中不讓人們在紅燈時亂穿馬路。

sentences.english: The traffic police flagged the passing car down.
sentences.chinese: 交通警察揮旗命令那輛經過的汽車停下來。

sentences.english: JAPANESE traffic cops were until recently a genteel bunch.
sentences.chinese: 不久之前日本的交通警察還是溫文爾雅的一羣人。

definition: traffic police/abbr. for 交通警察
to be on duty (of a security guard etc)
abbr. for 刑事警察[xing2 shi4 jing3 cha2]/criminal police
local government bylaw enforcement officer/city management (abbr. for 城市管理行政執法局|城市管理行政执法局[Cheng2 shi4 Guan3 li3 Xing2 zheng4 Zhi2 fa3 ju2])
variant of 執勤|执勤[zhi2 qin2]
